subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4826, how did it go?
description_text:
Haven't got them yet.

On Mon, 5 Jan 2026, 11.01 SIMSONN, <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Mikko, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
